CARD:DESC:avatar: Your units respawn if they lose a battle.
CARD:DESC:avatarElite: Your units (receive a +1 battle modifier and) respawn if they lose a battle.
CARD:DESC:confusion: Swap the position of two units from one faction.
CARD:DESC:confusionElite: Swap the position of two units from one faction. (Use this effect twice.)
CARD:DESC:corruption: One unit receives a -3 battle modifier.
CARD:DESC:corruptionElite: One (two) unit(s) receive(s) a -3 battle modifier.
CARD:DESC:fierySpeech: One of your soldiers(*) receives a +4 battle modifier.
CARD:DESC:fierySpeechElite: One of your soldiers(*) receives a +4 (+6) battle modifier.
CARD:DESC:guerrilla: Deploy one additional soldier(*) in your home territory.
CARD:DESC:guerrillaElite: Deploy one additional soldier(*)(hero(**)) in your home territory.
CARD:DESC:marauder: Replace one of your units with a hero(**).
CARD:DESC:marauderElite: Replace one of your units with a hero(**). (Enemy units receive a -2 battle modifier.)
CARD:DESC:pathfinder: Units move two fields per action and receive a +1 battle modifier. A fight can only start at the second field.
CARD:DESC:pathfinderElite: Units move two fields per action and receive a +1 (+3) battle modifier. A fight can only start at the second field.
CARD:DESC:prophecy: Reveal the strength of two units.
CARD:DESC:prophecyElite: Reveal the strength of two (four) units.
CARD:DESC:rebels: Deploy one additional soldier(*) anywhere except on the fortress walls.
CARD:DESC:rebelsElite: Deploy one (two) additional soldier(s)(*) anywhere except on the fortress walls.
CARD:DESC:swamp: Choose one faction that must skip its next movement phase.
CARD:DESC:swampElite: Choose one faction that must skip its next (action card and) movement phase.
CARD:DESC:truce: No unit is allowed to start a battle until your next turn.
CARD:DESC:truceElite: No (enemy) unit is allowed to start a battle until your next turn.
EVENT:DESC:burningWallCenter: Units standing at the center fortress wall are destroyed.
EVENT:DESC:burningWallLeft: Units standing at the left wall (from fortress owner's perspective) are destroyed.
EVENT:DESC:burningWallRight: Units standing at the right wall (from fortress owner's perspective) are destroyed
EVENT:DESC:crusade: Attacking soldiers(*) receive a +4 battle modifier.
EVENT:DESC:necromancy: Destroyed heroes(**) respawn as soldiers(*) of the active faction.
EVENT:DESC:plague: Every faction with six or more units removes two units of its own choice.
EVENT:DESC:poison: Every faction with four or more units loses one unit of its opponent's choice.
EVENT:DESC:rebirth: Attacking soldiers(*) respawn as heroes(**) if they lose a battle.
EVENT:DESC:swordsIntoPlowshares: Heroes(**) only have one strength point instead of two.
EVENT:DESC:veteran: Every faction replaces one of its units with a hero(**).
LOG:bidAccepted: The bidding phase is over, {player} takes the bid of {number} and is now playing the others as the challenger.
LOG:roundStart: Round {number} starts. The event {event} is revealed.
LOG:soloCardChosen: {player} chooses to add {card} to their cards.
LOG:startOfGame: The game (ID: {gameId}) begins with {player1}, {player2} and {player3}. The following selection of cards is available: {cardList}
LOG:unitModMulti: This turn, all {attOrDef}{unitType} get a {numberWithOperator} battle modifier.
LOG:unitModMultiPlayer: This round, all {attOrDef}{unitType} get a {numberWithOperator} battle modifier.
LOG:unitModSingle: This turn, the unit at {coordinate} receives a {numberWithOperator} battle modifier.
LOG:unitPromoted: {player} promotes a unit at {coordinate} to a {unitType}.
LOG:unitRevealed: The unit of {player} at {coordinate} is a {unitType}.
LOG:unitRevived: The unit of {player} at {coordinate} is revived as a {unitType}.
LOG:unitsFightAttWins: {playerAtt} thus attacks {playerDef}'s {unitTypeDef} with a {unitTypeAtt} and wins the fight with {numberAtt} to {numberDef}.
LOG:unitsFightDefWins: {playerAtt} thus attacks {playerDef}'s {unitTypeDef} with a {unitTypeAtt} and looses the fight with {numberAtt} to {numberDef}.
STATUS:SPECIAL:avatar: Your units are revived if they loose a fight.
STATUS:SPECIAL:avatarElite: Your units are revived if they loose a fight. Additionally your units receive {numberWithOperator} battle modifier.
STATUS:SPECIAL:avatarEliteWait: This turn, the units of {player} are revived if they loose a fight and receive {numberWithOperator} battle modifier.
STATUS:SPECIAL:avatarWait: This turn, the units of {player} are revived if they loose a fight.
STATUS:SPECIAL:confusionEliteStartPlacin: Choose an additional unit to swap with a unit of the same faction.
Do this twice: Choose a unit to swap with another unit of the same faction.
STATUS:SPECIAL:confusionEliteWithAlready: Select the other unit of the {faction} faction to switch with the unit at {coordinate}.
STATUS:SPECIAL:confusionStartPlacing: Choose a unit to swap with another unit of the same faction.
STATUS:SPECIAL:confusionWithAlreadySelec: Select the other unit of the {faction} faction to swap with the unit at {coordinate}.
STATUS:SPECIAL:corruptionElitePlace: Choose units for which the defense value shall be reduced by {number} during your turn.
STATUS:SPECIAL:corruptionEliteWait: Wait for {player} to choose two units for which the defense value is reduced by {number}.
STATUS:SPECIAL:corruptionPlace: Choose one unit for which the defense value shall be reduced by {number} during your turn.
STATUS:SPECIAL:corruptionWait: Wait for {player} to choose a unit for which the defense value is reduced by {number}.
STATUS:SPECIAL:crusade: This round, attacking {unitType} get a {numberWithOperator} battle modifier.
STATUS:SPECIAL:fierySpeechPlace: Choose one of your {unitType} to receive a {numberWithOperator} battle modifier.
STATUS:SPECIAL:fierySpeechWait: Wait for {player} to choose one of their {unitType} which will receive a {numberWithOperator} battle modifier.
STATUS:SPECIAL:guerrillaPlace: Place an additional {unitType} in your territory.
STATUS:SPECIAL:guerrillaWait: Wait for {player} to place an additional {unitType} in their territory.
STATUS:SPECIAL:lightningStrikeEliteWait: Wait for {player} to choose two units to destroy.
STATUS:SPECIAL:lightningStrikeWait: Wait for {player} to choose a unit to destroy.
STATUS:SPECIAL:marauderElite: This turn, your units get a {numberWithOperator} battle modifier.
STATUS:SPECIAL:marauderEliteWait: This turn, the units of {player} get a {numberWithOperator} battle modifier.
STATUS:SPECIAL:marauderPlace: Replace one of your units with a {unitType}.
STATUS:SPECIAL:marauderWait: Wait for {player} to replace one of their units with a {unitType}.
STATUS:whileBiddingChoosing: Take the bid of {} cards or pass.
STATUS:whileBiddingWaiting: Waiting for {} to take the bid of {} cards or pass.
STATUS:whileCardOrMoveChoosing: You have {} actions remaining. Play a card or move a unit.
STATUS:whileCardOrMoveWaiting: Waiting for {} to play a card or move a unit.
STATUS:whileCardOrSkipChoosing: Play a card or finish your turn since you're not allowed to move.
STATUS:whileCardOrSkipWaiting: Waiting for {} to play a card or skip their turn.
STATUS:whileCardSelectionChoosing: You chose to play as the solo faction. Choose {} cards from the middle.
STATUS:whileCardSelectionWaiting: Waiting for {} to take the cards from the middle as they are solo faction.
STATUS:whileHeroSelectionWaiting: Waiting for other players to finish placing their heroes.
STATUS:whileMoveChoosing: You have {} actions remaing. Move a unit.
STATUS:whileMoveWaiting: Waiting for {} to move a unit.
